directions: Whisk balsamic vinegar, olive oil, honey, and lime juice in a large bowl. Add coleslaw mix, baby kale, red onion, and sunflower seeds; toss to combine. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 5 ounces baby kale, chopped into bite-size pieces
2 tablespoons sunflower seeds, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Timesaver Kale Slaw
